list.historyEntry:
I'm getting the following error while syncing my project. The error is: java.util.zip.ZipException: zip END header not found ``` A problem occurred configuring project ':app'. > java.util.zip.ZipException: zip END header not found
* Try: > Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. > Run with --scan to generate a Build Scan (Powered by Develocity). > Get more help at https://help.gradle.org.
* Exception is: org.gradle.api.ProjectConfigurationException: A problem occurred configuring project ':app'. ... Caused by: java.util.zip.ZipException: zip END header not found at org.jetbrains.kotlin.incremental.classpathDiff.JarReader.<init>(ClasspathEntrySnapshotter.kt:119) at org.jetbrains.kotlin.incremental.classpathDiff.DirectoryOrJarReader$Companion.create(ClasspathEntrySnapshotter.kt:87) at org.jetbrains.kotlin.incremental.classpathDiff.ClasspathEntrySnapshotter.snapshot(ClasspathEntrySnapshotter.kt:42) at org.jetbrains.kotlin.buildtools.internal.CompilationServiceImpl.calculateClasspathSnapshot(CompilationServiceImpl.kt:84) ``` How do I fix this?

Explain: StrictMode policy violation: android.os.strictmode.NetworkViolation at android.os.StrictMode$AndroidBlockGuardPolicy.onNetwork(StrictMode.java:1680) at com.android.org.conscrypt.Platform.blockGuardOnNetwork(Platform.java:429) at com.android.org.conscrypt.ConscryptEngineSocket$SSLOutputStream.writeInternal(ConscryptEngineSocket.java:710) at com.android.org.conscrypt.ConscryptEngineSocket$SSLOutputStream.write(ConscryptEngineSocket.java:705) with tag StrictMode
